The NTR Cloud is a modular and collaborative cloud-based remote support management software for the mid-tier and enterprise helpdesk and ITSM markets.
 
The NTR Cloud offers productivity packs to boost IT performance and better serve your internal and external customers. These solutions are scalable and modular so you can add functionality, devices and users at any time. However, if you want to use it for private or non-commercial use try our Free Cloud offering that lets you instantly access any computer from your Window, Linux and Mac devices.

The NTR Cloud user experience is improved with this NTRglobal plugin that lets you conduct remote controls without the need to download each time an executable.
